name: Taşkıran Kızılboynuz
desc: Bir önceki sahibinin açıklamasına göre, bu "Yüce Kızılboynuz Metin Taşkıran Yaldızlı Taşkıran Aslan Efendisi" ile karşılaşan tüm canavarlar kuyruğunu bacaklarının arasına sıkıştırıp kaçar.

desc.text:
<color=#ffffff73>Bu silahın tam adı "Yüce Kızılboynuz Metin Taşkıran Yaldızlı Taşkıran Aslan Efendisi".</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Bu silah bir zamanlar "Aslan Kral Otogi Kongou" olarak bilinen tuhaf birinin sevgili kılıcıydı.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Her iki isim de aşırı uzun olduğu için...</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Çocuklar silaha Kızılboynuz Tokmak ve onu kullanan kişiye de "Otogi Kral" adını verdiler.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Kızılboynuz Tokmak, büyülü bir canavarın boynuzundan yapılmış bir silahtı.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Bake-Kitsune, bake-danuki ve benzer şeytani varlıkların hepsi, bu silahın önünde merhamet dilenirdi.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Yougou Dağı'ndaki Büyük Tengu Reizenbou bile</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Kızılboynuz Tokmağın uğursuz gücünden korkar, Aslan Kralın karşısına çıkamazdı.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Elbette çocuklar bu tür hikayelere asla inanmazdı.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Nitekim Otogi Kral gerçekten çok güçlüydü. Yedi kişi birden bile onu dohyo'dan atamazdı.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Çocukların ulaşamadığı meyvelerde gözünün kaldığını görünce, ağacı tekmeleyerek meyveleri yere düşürürdü.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Gerçi bir defasında tüm ağacı devirmişti ve yaşlı bir adam onu dağlara kadar kovalamıştı.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Bir defasında da çocuklarla birlikte resmi bir sonbahar konserini basmıştı.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Yüksek sesle, "Aslan Kral Otogi Kongou burada. İblisler kaçın!" diye haykırmıştı.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Ardından, tam da sürtüşme modunda olan ufak tefek Oni ile dövüşmüştü... Sonuç ise izlenemeyecek kadar trajikti.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>"Peki ama Kralın elinden gelen sadece bu kadarsa, hatta ona Şogun'un renklerini giyme hakkı bile verilmediyse...</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Şarkılardaki youkailere nasıl diz çöktürmüş?" diye sordu çocuklar.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>"Hah! Bütün gece içtiğim için akşamdan kalmaydım, hepsi bu!"</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Otogi Kral bahane uydururken bile, içtenlikle gülmeyi ihmal etmemişti.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Utanmaz biri miydi yoksa gerçekten kazanabileceğine mi inanıyordu? Bu konuda kimse emin değildi...</color>
<color=#ffffff73>"Bu sefer, o canavarların boynuzlarını kesin koparacağım,"</color>
<color=#ffffff73>"Sonra da size getireceğim. Böylece Aslan Kral Otogi Kongou'nun kudretini göreceksiniz!"</color>
<color=#ffffff73>"Okyanus ötesinden gelen o yaratıklar mı? Onlar kolay lokma, ben diyeyim size!"</color>
<color=#ffffff73>"Hadi, kış kış, gidip o tilki elçisini takip edin de bir köşeye saklanın."</color>
<color=#ffffff73>"Daha sonra uğrarım. Birkaç güreş müsabakası yaparız, olur mu?"</color>
<color=#ffffff73>O bunları söylerken, çocuklar narin Oni'nin nasıl hafifçe homurdandığını hatırlıyordu.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Kükreyerek hücum eden Otogi Kralı gökyüzüne fırlatmıştı...</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Daha sonra, Otogi Kralla güreşen Oni, kolunu ve boynuzunu kaybederek kaçmıştı.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Büyük Tengu ise dağlarda ve ormanda münzevi yaşam sürüyor, artık insanların karşısına çıkmıyordu.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Böylece bu kılıcın ardındaki boş övünmeler de sonunda doğru çıkmıştı.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Başıboş dolaşan, tuhaf Aslan Kral Otogi Kongou ise bir daha geri dönmedi.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Tekme atarak devirdiği Eflatun Kavun ağacı, daha sonraları yapılan özenli bir bakımla yeniden meyve vermeye başladı.</color>

customize.name: Arataki Itto
customize.desc: Inazuma'daki Hanamizaka'da ünlü Arataki Çetesinin ilk ve en büyük lideri... Bir dakika, ne? Onları hiç duymadın mı? Şaka yapıyor olmalısın!

customize.text: <color=#ffffff73>This weapon increases DEF, which synergizes with Itto's talents. Additionally, it increases Normal Attack and Charge Attack DMG based on DEF and significantly increases CRIT DMG. This makes it an excellent weapon of choice for Itto.</color>

customize.name: Noelle
customize.desc: Favonius Şövalyelerine sadaketle hizmet eden bir hizmetçi. Bir gün tam teşekküllü bir şövalye olmayı hayal ediyor.

customize.text: <color=#ffffff73>This weapon increases DEF, which synergizes with Noelle's talents. Additionally, it increases Normal Attack DMG based on DEF and significantly increases CRIT DMG. This makes it an excellent weapon of choice for Noelle.</color>

customize.name: Xinyan
customize.desc: Liyue'nin tek rock müzisyeni. Tutkulu müziği ve sözleriyle tüm tabularla alay eder.

customize.text: <color=#ffffff73>This weapon increases DEF. Since Xinyan can convert DEF to ATK after unlocking C6, the CRIT DMG sub-stats make this weapon an ideal choice for Xinyan.</color>

materials.name: Narukami'nin Bilgeliği
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
In the past, the ancients would climb the peak now known as Mt. Yougou and bend wood that had been charred by lightning into a hook to offer as an effigy unto the thundering force that lit up the skies and shook the earth. This shape would eventually become the "Electro Mitsudomoe" symbol, symbolizing the favor, wisdom, and might of Electro, and also the people who represent these values.

materials.name: Gizli Pençe
materials.desc:
Residual body tissue left behind by one of the Riftwolves.
By ordinary logic, these objects, so alien to this world, should not have remained behind after these abnormal creatures were excised from the land.

materials.name: Eski Balçak
materials.desc:
A battle-worn handguard that was once mounted on an Inazuman blade.
For those adept in the art of the sword, the tsuba is a defense from the edge of an opponent's blade. For beginners, it is a defense made for their own right hand, to protect it from itself.

materials.name: Narukami'nin Neşesi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Those who belong to the Shogunate Commissions are those who administer and exercise power. In the monster-filled tales of the ancient past, those who were deeply trusted by the Shogun would bear talismans with this hooked design on their person, and just as the word "commission" means to "joyfully serve" in the old tongue, those who received her favor would return it with love and loyalty. Yet, after a certain point in time, nothing would be as it was before.

materials.name: Gizli Pençe
materials.desc:
Residual body tissue left behind by one of the Riftwolves.
By ordinary logic, these objects, so alien to this world, should not have remained behind after these abnormal creatures were excised from the land.

materials.name: Eski Balçak
materials.desc:

For those adept in the art of the sword, the tsuba is a defense from the edge of an opponent's blade. For beginners, it is a defense made for their own right hand, to protect it from itself.

materials.name: Narukami'nin Neşesi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Those who belong to the Shogunate Commissions are those who administer and exercise power. In the monster-filled tales of the ancient past, those who were deeply trusted by the Shogun would bear talismans with this hooked design on their person, and just as the word "commission" means to "joyfully serve" in the old tongue, those who received her favor would return it with love and loyalty. Yet, after a certain point in time, nothing would be as it was before.

materials.name: Gizli Keskin Pençe
materials.desc:
Body tissue left behind by one of the Riftwolves.
Though they are quite wondrous indeed, these hunting hounds of "Alfisol" are nothing of note before Durin of "Humus."

materials.name: Kageuchi Balçağı
materials.desc:
A handguard mounded upon a sword of some distinction.
Inazuma has a long tradition of sword-making. When making swords, smiths will often make several different weapons at once, before choosing from among them the "shinuchi," or the best weapon, while the others are known as "kageuchi."

materials.name: Narukami'nin Sevgisi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
All demons who wander in the wilderness or live amongst mortals will be attracted by the sight of the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, represented by the Electro Mitsudomoe. Though their lives may be longer than any creature, they will at last come to their end. If those with limited lifespans hanker after eternity, then they can only pray that "Eternity" remembers them. And she did indeed answer their prayers, remembering them all, friend and foe alike, in her heart. No matter whether it was the demon owls who resided amidst the fog and ripped through the skies, the bake-danuki who dared to trespass her imperial gardens, or that female oni, lovely as the moon and mighty in battle, yet who would eventually come to blows with her... Whether it was the tengu who soared on dark wings or the Kitsune Saiguu who once walked by her side, but who eventually disappeared forever...
These countless tales have come to rest within her heart, and someday, they will surely shine again in the eternal paradise of her dreams.

materials.name: Gizli Keskin Pençe
materials.desc:
Body tissue left behind by one of the Riftwolves.
Though they are quite wondrous indeed, these hunting hounds of "Alfisol" are nothing of note before Durin of "Humus."

materials.desc:

Inazuma has a long tradition of sword-making. When making swords, smiths will often make several different weapons at once, before choosing from among them the "shinuchi," or the best weapon, while the others are known as "kageuchi."

materials.name: Narukami'nin Sevgisi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
All demons who wander in the wilderness or live amongst mortals will be attracted by the sight of the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, represented by the Electro Mitsudomoe. Though their lives may be longer than any creature, they will at last come to their end. If those with limited lifespans hanker after eternity, then they can only pray that "Eternity" remembers them. And she did indeed answer their prayers, remembering them all, friend and foe alike, in her heart. No matter whether it was the demon owls who resided amidst the fog and ripped through the skies, the bake-danuki who dared to trespass her imperial gardens, or that female oni, lovely as the moon and mighty in battle, yet who would eventually come to blows with her... Whether it was the tengu who soared on dark wings or the Kitsune Saiguu who once walked by her side, but who eventually disappeared forever...
These countless tales have come to rest within her heart, and someday, they will surely shine again in the eternal paradise of her dreams.

materials.name: Gizli Vahşi Pençe
materials.desc:
A sharp nail left behind by one of the Riftwolves.
All the marvels in the world must pale before "Cretaceus," the greatest work of them all.

materials.name: Gösterişli Balçak
materials.desc:
An intricately-made handguard that was mounted upon a famed weapon.
Some believe that swords have souls and lives of their own, and thus deserve their own names. Those who love their blades will be acknowledged by them in turn. But those who see their swords as friends or even lovers should be warned that this relationship is built on death and bloodshed. The passions of those who dance with their blade amid crimson showers must surely be cooled someday by fickle steel.

materials.name: Narukami'nin Cesareti
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The treasure of the lord of thunder is her majesty, and that majesty is embodied in her valor and wrath. Her wrath comes from the love that persists in her heart, and her valor supports that anger. Thus, whomsoever should block the path towards eternity or lay a finger on Inazuma's people shall become her foe.
They say that there were four great spirits, three divine foxes, and two great swords — but that the symbol of Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, could only be a single strike, unsurpassed and brilliant as a meteor.

materials.name: Gizli Vahşi Pençe
materials.desc:
A sharp nail left behind by one of the Riftwolves.
All the marvels in the world must pale before "Cretaceus," the greatest work of them all.

Some believe that swords have souls and lives of their own, and thus deserve their own names. Those who love their blades will be acknowledged by them in turn. But those who see their swords as friends or even lovers should be warned that this relationship is built on death and bloodshed. The passions of those who dance with their blade amid crimson showers must surely be cooled someday by fickle steel.
